 The political action thriller is set        
 against the backdrop of the tumultuous      
 and controversial Sri Lankan civil war      
 of the 1990s. The film stars John Abraham   
 as an Indian Army Intelligence Agent sent   
 to Sri Lanka to break a resolute rebel group
 Once there, he meets a charismatic female   
 journalist, played by Nargis Fakhri who is  
 determined to uncover the truth about the   
 civil war. Together the pair uncover a      
 deeper, sinister conspiracy by a faceless   
 enemy.
